Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the username, such as transfer_user.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The Amazon Resource Name associated with the user, in the form  arn:aws:transfer:region:account-id:user/server-id/username . An example of a user ARN is: arn:aws:transfer:us-east-1:123456789012:user/user1.
The ID of the server to which the user is attached. An example ServerId is s-01234567890abcdef.
A unique string that identifies a Transfer Family user account associated with a server. An example UserName is transfer-user-1.
